welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
# **GAMECORD**

> **Discord Gamecord is a powerful npm package with a collection of minigames for your discord bot :)** ## **âš™ï¸ Installation** ``` npm i discord-gamecord ``` ## **âœ¨ Features** - Easy to use. - Beginner friendly. - Slash Commands Games. - Supports Discord.js v13 & v14. ## **ðŸ“š Usage** ```js const { Snake } = require('discord-gamecord'); const Game = new Snake({ message: message, isSlashGame: false, embed: { title: 'Snake Game', overTitle: 'Game Over', color: '#5865F2' }, emojis: { board: 'â¬›', food: 'ðŸŽ', up: 'â¬†ï¸', down: 'â¬‡ï¸', left: 'â¬…ï¸', right: 'âž¡ï¸', }, stopButton: 'Stop', timeoutTime: 60000, snake: { head: 'ðŸŸ¢', body: 'ðŸŸ©', tail: 'ðŸŸ¢', over: 'ðŸ’€' }, foods: ['ðŸŽ', 'ðŸ‡', 'ðŸŠ', 'ðŸ«', 'ðŸ¥•', 'ðŸ¥', 'ðŸŒ½'], playerOnlyMessage: 'Only {player} can use these buttons.' }); Game.startGame(); Game.on('gameOver', result => { console.log(result); // => { result... } }); ``` ## **ðŸ“· Preview** ![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/818900078077018162/1042159356780757072/Preview.png) ## **â” Support** [![discordBadge](https://invidget.switchblade.xyz/GaczkwfgV9)](https://discord.gg/invite/GaczkwfgV9)

options.name: Game Options
options.content:
## **ðŸ”–Approve Options**
```js
{
  embed: {
    requestTitle: 'Game Request',
    requestColor: '#57F287',
    rejectTitle: 'Cancelled Request',
    rejectColor: '#ED4245'
  },
  buttons: {
    accept: 'Accept',
    reject: 'Reject'
  },
  reqTimeoutTime: 30000,
  requestMessage: '{player} has invited you for a round of Game.',
  rejectMessage: 'The player denied your request for a round of Game.',
  reqTimeoutMessage: 'Dropped the game as the player did not respond.'
}
```

## **ðŸ”– Player Formatting**
```js
{player} => Player Mention
{player.tag} => Player Discord Tag
{player.username} => Player Username
```


## **ðŸ”– Button Styles**
```js
PRIMARY: Blurple
SECONDARY: Grey
SUCCESS: Green
DANGER: Red
```
